titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Campaign for Yale Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:43

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of attendance books, regional briefing binders, memoranda and gift reports, and correspondence documenting the activities and operations of the Campaign for Yale. Also includes correspondence and ledgers of the Yale Alumni Fund.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 7-C (YRG 7-C), Records of Yale development projects and campaigns.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Campaign for Yale Records (RU 437). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of attendance books, regional briefing binders, memoranda and gift reports, and correspondence documenting the activities and operations of the Campaign for Yale. Also includes correspondence and ledgers of the Yale Alumni Fund.

did.unittitle: Correspondence of John Perry Miller, Hazel R. Dingle, and Mark H. Biddle: Chronological files of green carbons
Reports, with related correspondence and drafts
"Proposed Capital Campaign: Preliminary Statement for Corporation"
"Guidelines for Campaign Accounting" by Wallace E. Tobin III
"History of Yale Since 1960" by Suzanne Smith and Penelope Pigott, for Cutler Committee
Committees: minutes, reports, related materials, lists of members, members' correspondence
Campaign Advisory Committee (originally International Advisory Committee)
Publications re: Yale graduate and professional schools
"The Campaign for Yale" (The Case Statement)(1974 Apr): copies, drafts, correspondence
"Prospectus of Yale" (1975 Sep): copies, drafts, correspondence
President's Office: texts of speeches, records of activities of President Brewster
President's Office: records of special meetings of President Brewster on behalf of Campaign, miscellaneous
Yale offices: financial planning for special projects
Commission on Alumni Affairs: reports on alumni organizations at other colleges (notebook)
Yale Alumni Fund: Scrapbook: correspondence, clippings
Yale's Program for the Arts and Sciences
New York Region: Co-Chairman A (Vol. I-II)
Operating Plan and Revised Leadership Projects
Background and Procedures on Prospectiry and Rating
Major and Special Gifts: Committee Members
Major and Special Gifts: Operating Plan
Interim report on the proposed Campaign for Yale
Interim report on the proposed Campaign for Yale
Volunteer committees and professional staff information
